ygData.subject: Re: Finally...
ygData.msgSnippet: I m very glad we all finally have the ability to make it, not that it is more than novelty but hey, at least we can make jokes about our extendable rods
ygData.messageBody:
I'm very glad we all finally have the ability to make it, not that it
is more than novelty but hey, at least we can make jokes about our
extendable rods *smirk*... On a more grim note, at what skill can you
start making the spyglass? I tried once last night and bombed, not
having another 20pp to drop I decided to wait until I was a more mature
gnome or at least had a big wad-o-coin to pump into this venture. And
yes, fireworks seem too pooped to pop.

Rhin
the nearly deleted warrior of E'Ci

--- lockjaw <lockjaw@...> wrote:
> I've been wanting this formula for a long time, and Luke has been
> looking
> even longer.
>
> 3 rods and some gnomish bolts
>
> go figure eh?
